name: Snow Day (John Wienke)
description:
Snow Day is a short little game about the importance of snow days.

To play use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move around. On a touch screen device simply flick the screen in the direction you would like to go.

Credits:

Music - Scouting, by Eveningland

Game Engine - Bitsy, created by Adam Le Doux

Everything else - Me :)
